descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Archer & Guardians

Archer & Guardians is a VR tower defense action game set in a fantasy world. 
Become an archer, team up with animal allies like the Deer Warrior and Rabbit Wizard, and defend your base against waves of monsters, including mighty dragons!  Strategically place units and unleash your archery skills.

---

## Game Overview
- Step into the shoes of an archer and protect your base in a vibrant fantasy world.
- Team up with animal allies like the Deer Warrior and Rabbit Mage, each with unique abilities.
- Battle against a variety of monsters, including mighty dragons, aiming to breach your defenses.
- Combine strategic unit placement with thrilling, intuitive VR archery.

---

## Features
- **Immersive VR Archery**: Experience realistic bow handling designed for Meta Quest.
- **Strategic Action**: Plan your defenses and skillfully shoot your way through waves of enemies.
- **Fantasy World Adventure**: Defend against a colorful array of fantastical monsters.
- **Family-Friendly Fun**: No graphic violence—safe and enjoyable for younger players too.

---

## Future Updates
- New stages and levels will be added regularly!
- A brand-new defense game mode with different gameplay mechanics is in development!

---

## Important Notes
- This game is currently in Early Access.
- Stage content and gameplay balance may change with future updates.
- We are actively improving the game based on player feedback.

---

## Rally your allies and defend your world from the monster onslaught!
